programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.desc:
''Surviving The Island'' -In this special episode of The Island With Bear Grylls takes an in-depth look at life on the islands.
On The Island, Bear conducted the ultimate survival challenge to see if 14 men and 14 women could survive for six weeks on an uninhabited island in the Pacific Ocean. They were completely alone, filming everything themselves, with only a handful of basic tools and the clothes they stood up in. They not only had to survive entirely on their own wits for six gruelling weeks, but had to contend with the vicious tropical storm season.
In this special episode Surviving The Island, Bear returns to meet the men and women who made it through the experiment and sees first hand how they managed to survive for the past six weeks. He hears their reflections on their time on the island and shares his thoughts on how they have coped with the extremes.

programme.title: Long March to Freedom: Part 2
programme.desc: In the course of battle, many allied troops were forced to surrender. As if that wasn't humiliating enough, they were being sent to camps, surrounded by barbed wire, unbeknownst to the horrors that awaited them.

programme.title: Long March to Freedom: Part 3
programme.desc: As the war came to an end, there were over 300,000 prisoners held by the Nazis. But their freedom will not simply granted upon Germany's surrender. They then faced a journey through harsh landscapes and a bitter winter in order to get home.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare: Weapons, Battles, Leaders: Aircraft
programme.desc: Since the dawn of aerial warfare in the First World War, air supremacy has been key to victory. From the Sopwith Camel bi-plane and the P-51 Mustang, to the hi-tech F22 Raptor and the game-changing Harrier Jump Jet, this episode uses dramatic and rarely seen archive footage and expert interviews to identify and rank the most influential aircraft in history.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare: Weapons, Battles, Leaders: Battles
programme.desc: Wars have been won and lost on the battlefield, and during the 20th Century, specific battles have changed the course of history. With incredible archives from the heart of the action, and interviews with world-leading historians, this action-packed episode counts down the most decisive and game-changing battles of warfare ever caught on camera.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare: Weapons, Battles, Leaders: Inventions
programme.desc: Warfare has always driven the development of new technology, and technological innovations of warfare have changed the world. From the mass production of life saving penicillin and pioneering plastic surgery, to the development of the Internet and GPS, this episode uses rare archive footage and expert interviews to identify and rank the most influential inventions of warfare.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare: Weapons, Battles, Leaders: Vessels
programme.desc: From the super-dreadnought battleships of the First World War to the stealth submarines of the Cold War, maritime vessels have proved decisive in the fight for naval supremacy. This episode counts down the ten most iconic and game-changing ships and submarines of the 20th century.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare: Weapons, Battles, Leaders: Weapons
programme.desc: It’s been said that the human race has spent more time, money, and effort developing weapons than in any other endeavor. From the mass production of the torpedo and the tank-busting rocket-propelled grenade launcher, to the development of poison gas and the groundbreaking science of the atomic bomb, this episode identifies and ranks the most influential and iconic weapons of warfare.

programme.title: Jack And Yaya
programme.desc: Jack and Yaya met at ages three and two through their shared backyard fence. They spent their childhood together, building forts and burning trash cans in their small hometown in South Jersey. From a young age, Yaya and Jack saw each other as they truly were, a girl and a boy, even though the rest of the world didn't see them that way. As they grew older, they supported each other as they both came out as transgender. Decades later, Jack and Yaya remain best friends. Jack now lives in Boston with his loyal pup, Plinko, and works as a kindergarten teacher, while Yaya lives in her childhood home, waiting tables and trying to make ends meet after her mother's passing. During his summer vacation, Jack travels back to his childhood home to spend time with Yaya and his extended family. Jack and Yaya follows these two friends for a year and explores their unique relationship, drawing on home videos and conversations with their eclectic cast of friends and family.

programme.desc: "Dark Waters" - A decomposing body is found in a pond and a tent is found nearby. Dr. G performs the autopsy in the morgue but finds few clues other than fingerprints and mouthwash in the stomach.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Ashes to Ashes" - On a Texas highway, a fire is discovered having burnt three bodies beyond recognition. Dr. G finds bullets in the bodies and determines that they were all shot before being set on fire.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Fighting for the Truth" - An employee is found dead in a restaurant kitchen. Clues found near the body include an empty cash register, a knife and a trail of blood splotches leading to a vandalized car in the parking lot.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Dying to Be Young" - A healthy 53-year-old woman is found dead in bed. After performing an autopsy and taking blood and tissue samples, Dr. G cannot find the cause of death.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Death on the Road" - A man is found dead in a motel room due to multiple shotgun wounds. Dr. G proves the scene isn't what it seems.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When 19-year-old Lori Auker left her Pennsylvania home for work and never arrived, it took space-age technology, cat hairs and insects to pinpoint the image of the woman's abductor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Forensic computer analysis, blood spatter analysis and a painstaking investigation lead police to a lawyer husband Michael "Mick" Fletcher with a motive to kill his wife.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Lisa Manderach and her daughter Devon left their Pennsylvania home to go shopping, but didn't return home.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: In 1996, police received a call from Darlie Routier telling them of her two sons' murders. The police found the killer by analyzing blood spatter, doing behavioral profiling and analyzing Darlie's 911 call.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: On a windy Kansas night in 1995, a mysterious fire swept through the home of a prominent doctor. In the debris, investigators found evidence which told them how the fire started.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: In 1990, Shirley Andronowich's body was found mutilated. Eyewitnesses told police she had a fight with her husband the night before, but forensic evidence proved that he had nothing to do with her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: The doctors at the hospital couldn't determine the cause of Bobby Curley's hallucinations and intense pain. They treated it as a neurological disorder but his condition deteriorated. He was being poisoned.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Who was the sexual offender who murdered two adolescent boys in Nebraska? The key to stopping him would be the unique composition of the "junk rope" he used to tie his victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Mark Fair left for work and his fiancée, Karla Brown, stayed home. Later, he found her dead. During the autopsy, bite marks on her body were re-examined and forensic odontology identified the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: In 1996, more than a dozen children in Seattle, Washington, were fighting for their lives. Each one of them had contracted a serious unknown illness. After one died, investigators knew the clock was ticking.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Fire engulfs the home where Lori Keidel and her siblings were left alone while their father went to the laundromat. Years after her mother's disappearance, Lori tells police she witnessed her mother's death.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Young Navajos in the Southwest were dying at an alarming rate. The tribe's medicine men provided investigators with a critical clue that would lead halfway around the world to a most unlikely killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Edward Post drew a bath for his wife before going for a run. He returned to find her not breathing. She died before emergency response arrived. Police considered her death accidental until a motive surfaced.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: When a decomposed body is found stuffed in a barrel, it's easy to presume murder. But the body had been placed in the barrel 30 years earlier. One of the few clues was an address book found along with the body.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: Nancy Newman and her two daughters are found brutally murdered. The crime scene has no shortage of evidence, but investigators cannot find a conclusive link to their prime suspect. To solve the puzzle, an FBI analyst designs a unique experiment.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Playmates Super Bowl Special" - Playboy Playmates walk a tightrope 10 stories up, eat strawberries from an insect-filled box and retrieve glow sticks from freezing water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Traverse The Dam, Bee Headed, Water Coffin" - Are you worth a Dam? Suspended high over a dam is a 350-foot long tightrope with flags attached. Contestants would have to cross the tightrope and collect flags while holding on to a higher tightrope for support. The two men and the two women to collect the most flags in 5 minutes would advance to the next round. Stunt 2 is a real Bee. The ones left are covered with over 200,000 honeybees. Once covered, they would have stand for 2 minutes covered in bees. All contestants who completed this stunt would advance to the finals. For the finale, contestants are locked inside a Plexiglas box full of holes and submerged underwater. Once a red light came on, they would have to figure out which of 2 keys unlocked the coffin and swim to the surface. The contestant to complete this stunt the fastest would be the Fear Factor Champion.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Counter Balance Beam, Weenie Roast, Swinging Rope Bridge" - With $50,000 up for grabs, Joe Rogan introduces six new contestants to the first three stunts of the new series including the gruesome `Weenie Roast'.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Triple Beam Walk, Glasswalking, Magnetic Car Plunge" - Perched on the hood of a car suspended 100 feet high by a giant electric magnet, contestants must switch it off, sending themselves and the vehicle plummeting toward a target on the ground.

programme.desc: This is the 'International Special' and Richard Hammond, your giggling, non-partisan hosts as British brilliance on the world's craziest obstacle course is put to the test by the finest athletes from Germany, France, and the USA, amongst others. The game is divided into two teams, one with UK contestants, and the other with people from all over the world.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: This is the last episode of the season and the eight previous winners compete to be crowned Champion of Champions. Will one of the already crowned champions walk away with the trophy and prize money, or will one of the runners-up get their revenge? It's a thrilling ride to find out!

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Some people believe that the Oscars mark the highlight of the awards season, while others would argue the Baftas are the most exciting event of the year. programme.title: Swing Expedition with Chris Como
programme.desc: "A journey to explore golf's leading teachers, players and influencers. Chris Como travels to Denver and learns how Bryson DeChambeau builds muscle and maintains strength before, during, and in between tournaments."

programme.title: School Of Golf (Instructional)
programme.desc: "Instructor Martin Hall provides tips and drills utilizing an in-studio golf simulator. Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal share how to start the 2020 golf season off hot. Martin reveals how a hockey stick can simplify one of the most misunderstood terms in golf, and shares advice straight from Tiger Woods about how to return to the game and avoid rusty play. Also, a unique lesson on why golfers and football players competing in the Super Bowl should both be trying to find the end zone."

programme.title: Florida Sportsman The Watermen: Crystal River sight fishing with Capt. Lacey Kelly
programme.desc: The lush grass flats and thriving fisheries in the Crystal River area are a prime example of successful restoration and conservation efforts. Explore the amazing sight fishing and beautiful flats with Capt. Lacey Kelly and Capt. Kayla McGuire.

programme.title: The Fin Chasers: Montauk Redbone Tournament Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 of the FCA Montauk Slam. Capt. Frank & Capt. Anthony Grassi head to Montauk, NY to participate in this charity tournament to benefit Cystic Fibrosis. Chef Kerry Heffernan and Chef Harold Dieterle join Capt. Frank for some pre-tournament fishing and eating!

programme.title: Guns and Ammo: .50MG Out to 2+ Miles
programme.desc: The hit TV show Bonanza influenced many of us during our formative years and we get some hands-on experience with several of the guns that made that show great. Bryan Morgan launches a .50BMG and impacts a sub-MOA target at almost 2.2 miles away.

programme.title: The Sporting Chef: Stacy Lynn Harris
programme.desc: Chef Leysath lets Stacy Lyn Harris run things on the show today and she’s cooking duck! Also on the show are Susie Jimenez, Josh McGuire, Melissa Bachman, Cee Dub, and Buddy T.

programme.title: Spanish Fly: Isla Secas Panama Marlin
programme.desc: Jose Wejebe and the Spanish Fly crew travel to the islands of Isla Secas in Panama to meet up with old friend Carter Big Boy Andrews where he now runs a new fishing operation. Carter and Jose had a rich history when Carter worked in the Bahamas, and they continue their relationship on new waters exploring the inshore and offshore fisheries. The first days are spent trolling the famed Hannibal Bank where marlin, mahi and tuna all feed on the abundance of bait. Since Carter caught Jose his first blue marlin, they target bonitas for live baiting, and then search for the big black or blue marlin. The hunt pays off with Incredible footage of the acrobatic marlin and there is much rejoicing.

programme.title: Spanish Fly: Key West Shimano Color Change Sailfish
programme.desc: Jose Wejebe and the Spanish Fly crew continues in Key West testing out new high performance gear for Shimano. They started in Key West harbor with big tarpon, but now take the new prototype rods and reels out fishing the open ocean where color changes serve as natural barrier edges that big sailfish travel. Heavy winds out of east in spring muddy the inshore waters, and slowly that muddy water moves out to catch the Gulfstream. That color change is where we target sailfish that surf the waves called tailing. When all the variables come together, lots of powerful action happens along that edge, making fishing exciting because it brings the element of sightfishing to sailfish.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Uncharted: Yukon: Getting It Done
programme.desc: Wojo and Cathy go into overdrive as the hunting season wraps, getting hunters, guides and meat out of the bush. Steve’s client struggles to find anything after he passes on a mid-sized bull, but their luck turns when Jim decides to stop by with words of encouragement and a couple lucky beers.

programme.title: Trev Gowdy's Monster Fish: Striped Bass versus Mississippi Kingfish
programme.desc: STRIPED BASS VERSUS KINGFISH. Fred fishes off the Louisiana coast for huge Kingfish. Meanwhile Trev tests new baits in search of 50lb Stripers.

programme.title: MCMILLAN: Trapping Tom
programme.desc: Tom and Gatlin learn the art of trapping and take friends and family for a rooster hunt.

programme.title: Swarovski Optik Quests: Northwest Territory Caribou
programme.desc: Chasing Mountain Caribou in the Northwest Territory.

programme.title: Bowhunter TV: Island Bears
programme.desc: Bowhunter Contributor Matt Palmquist and friends go DIY for big black bears on Prince of Wales Island in Southeast Alaska. Then Archery Hall of Famer Randy Ulmer answers your bow poundage questions in "Dead On."

programme.title: The Musky Hunter: Game Plan
programme.desc: No matter where you chase muskies, you need to start the day with a game plan evaluating multiple options and making adjustments based upon the muskies response. Jim Saric, Musky Hunter Managing Editor Steve Heiting, and musky hunter Kevin Schmitt discuss how to develop a game plan on the water, while fishing in the Northwest Angle of Lake of the Woods in Ontario, Canada.

programme.title: Chasin the Sun: Chasin' a World Record - Part 2
programme.desc: Renowned angler Meredith McCord and Capt. Justin Leake continue their quest for a line class world record. When struggles begin the moment they leave the dock, grit and lady luck ensure an epic day ends in grand style.

programme.title: Storytellers S1:E3 "A Story Of Restoration Master"
programme.desc: From time to time you have moments that will change the way think about something. That is what happened for us while hunting the Scimitar Oryx with Republic Outdoors. Hunting is more than harvesting animals, it’s conservation, and in this story, we learn how a species nearly extinct gets another chance to live.

programme.title: Storytellers S1:E4 "Run-N-Gun Master"
programme.desc: The Texas Gulf Coast offers an array of opportunities to experience the outdoors. From fishing to waterfowl, we have found that every hunt gives us a chance to experience other people's stories. On this hunt, we learned not only about the incredible adventures that take place at Run-N-Gun, but also about a Texas based organization changing the lives of young people.

programme.title: Browning Films S3:E3 "Against The Crane"

programme.title: Browning Films S3:E4 "Broad Valley"

programme.title: Local Lines S1:E3 "Shallow Water Studs"

Year after year this style of fishing is becoming more popular and provides trophy quality fish in less than 10ft of water

programme.title: Larry Smith Outdoors S1:E3 "Walleyes With Issac Lakich And Justin Schneider"
programme.desc: Do you want to learn how to catch more walleyes using livescope? We teamed up with Isaac Lakich and Justin Schneider from Head to Head fishing and Warrior Boats pro staff members and went to Cedar River, MI to target GIANT walleyes! Using our livescope and other electronics we were able to specifically target the fish we wanted to catch and, man was it fun!

programme.title: Downton Dixie S1:E1 "Welcome To Downton Dixie"

programme.title: TRP S4:E46 - Ryan Martin - @BlueChipBoxer 2x World Champion Boxer
programme.desc: Ryan Martin is a 2x World Champion boxer. He has won many amateur titles and also 2 belts in the WBC. In between fight camps, Ryan joined me for a workout and we sat down after to talk about his upbringing and the incredible journey that he has taken to become a world champion boxer. Ryan shares his story of a difficult homelife and being on his own since the age of 16. Boxing consumed him and helped him to overcome depression and despair to reach the pinnacle of his sport. You can follow him on Instagram @bluechipboxer and watch him prepare for his next fight.

programme.desc: Betsy Ross is one of the most celebrated women in American history. She was a woman of great courage who was asked by Gen. Washington to defy the British and secretly give our nation its identity. Learn why in this episode as Chef Staib prepares meals Betsy would have made, Oyster Stew and Roasted Duckling Glazed with Honey.

programme.desc: A hot entree served with two scoops of rice and macaroni salad, the plate lunch is Hawaii’s version of a blue plate special. Hawaii Cooks visits several of Honolulu's busiest lunch time eateries to find out what makes an outstanding plate lunch.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - Sweet Nectar
programme.desc: In the remote reaches of Mexico, we learn how the world’s first organic fair trade honey is harvested. Chef Richard Sandoval, famed for his modern Mexican cuisine, wields a coa axe to show us how to tap the rare blue agave for its sweet syrup. With local ingredients in hand, it’s back to the kitchen where three generations of Sandoval’s prepare a Mexican feast with these sweet nectars.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Pork Chronicles
programme.desc: As opposed to the lean-is-better preference in America, Koreans love their pork full of fat and, incidentally, full of flavor. programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke meets up with his older brother, Lewis, and his cousin, Kristoff, in Paris, where his cousins have lived for decades and now run their own newly opened Vietnamese restaurant.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke inspects the first round of baguettes fresh from the oven, at an award winning bakery in central Paris.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke heads to Strasbourg where he develops a taste for all things Alsatian and samples a local tart flambé.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke seeks some French connections to his Vietnamese roots, making a chicken dish fusing the two cultures in the eastern region of Franche-Comté.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke explores Lyon, the food capital of France, making a classic salad Lyonnaise and celebrating local food culture.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: The Australian-Vietnamese chef heads to Marseille, cooking a fish soup fusion, a delicious salt and pepper cuttlefish, and a French-Vietnamese meal.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke Nguyen reaches Nice, where he discovers the best local produce and, naturally, attempts an authentic salad Nicoise.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke explores the south west, sampling Basque delicacies in Biarritz and oysters on the island of D'Oleron.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Chef Luke Nguyen's vibrant French tour continues around the oyster island of D'Oleron before he explores the food traditions of the Loire Valley.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: Luke Nguyen's colorful trip around France ends with rustic roast duck on the Loire and giant crabs and scallops in the seaside town of St Malo.

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: Guy takes a trip on the floating markets of Thailand, gathers barnacles on the deadly cliffs of Portugal, and throws a drool-worthy feast in Melbourne.

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: Guy discovers that island life is not all ocean swims and sun bathing... at least not while sourcing matcha in Japan, deadly Stone Fish in the Philippines and ingredients for a local feast in Orcas Island.

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: Green markets, fish markets, all the markets! Guy heads to Italy, Japan, and the California's Central Coast and discovers where some of the oldest, most sacred and freshest ingredients come from.

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: From Sicilian pistachios grown in the shadow of Mount Etna, to an epic feast under the California Redwoods Guy travels to some of the most visually stunning areas in the world to source and cook with amazing ingredients.

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: Whether it’s mole in Mexico or tiramisu in Italy, Guy gets a taste of regional specialties and uncovers the ingredients that give them their characteristic flavor.

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: Guy takes it back to our hunter-gatherer days as he forages on both land and sea for aromatic truffles, giant mushrooms and coastal clams.

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: Guy uncovers the many ways to catch a fish... and oysters! From fly fishing in Seattle, braving Australia's crocodile infested rivers for Barramundi and hand picking oysters on the Puget Sound, there's never a dull moment on the water.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - Foundations
programme.desc: The Inca built the largest pre-Columbian empire in the Americas. In Foundations, Dr. Jago Cooper explores how they did it.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - Clash of Empires
programme.desc: By the early sixteenth century, the Inca had conquered the Andes and controlled a huge swathe of western South America. But within a year of arriving in Peru, a few hundred Spanish conquistadors had captured their capital, Cuzco. Dr. Jago Cooper explores the reasons for the Incas' fall.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - Easter Island: Mysteries of a Lost World
programme.desc: The contrast between the majestic statues of Easter Island and the desolation of their surroundings is stark. For decades, Easter Island has been seen as a warning for the planet as a whole: exhaust natural resources and the collapse of civilisation is inevitable. But Dr Jago Cooper believes that this is a disastrous misreading of what happened on Easter Island. Far from being a failure, the culture was a success story - and the real reasons for its demise were not the actions of its people.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Great Escape - India Part 1
programme.desc: In tonight's first programme, Gordon's odyssey begins in the north, home of our curry house classics. On board an express train he's thrown in at the deep end and experiences a back-to-basics baptism of fire, cooking for its many passengers in the train's cramped pantry car and getting travel sick while he's making curry. In stark contrast he then meets his match working for a cantankerous royal chef, preparing a biryani with a difference for a huge wedding feast before venturing into the jungle where he gets eaten alive by ants when he scales a 40-foot tree in search of the local tribe's favourite delicacy. Then it's on to Delhi to cook at the restaurant that invented tandoori chicken, where Gordon puts into practice everything he's learnt for a tough crowd of Delhi food critics.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Great Escape - India Part 2
programme.desc: In tonight's second programme Gordon's got a taste for adventure and heads off the tourist track into impenetrable north-east India, home of the country's best-kept culinary secrets. Leaving the 21st century behind, he immerses himself in the life of a local meat-loving tribe in Nagaland, once better known for head-hunting than their curries. Then he's off to Assam to enter a housewives' competition to find the best Assamese dish and finally he sets up shop among the street food stalls of Calcutta to try and tempt the local foodies into buying north-east curry - Ramsay style.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Great Escape - India Part 3
programme.desc: In tonight's final programme Gordon heads south to the coasts of Kerala for the ultimate seafood curry. In Tamil Nadu he hits a meat-free zone and faces his biggest culinary nightmare, living in an ashram where the only food on the menu is vegetarian. Any tranquillity soon evaporates when Gordon tries his highest-octane sport yet - bullock racing - before his final stop in the slums of Mumbai. There he cooks on Slumdog Millionaire streets before putting himself to the ultimate test, cooking alongside one of India's top chefs for a star-studded dinner at the Taj Hotel.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Great Escape - Vietnam
programme.desc: Gordon touches down in Vietnam - he's never been here before but this nation are fearless foodies if it moves they eat it and every bit of it! On Gordon's travels he is wowed by legendary local restaurateur Mrs Duck who turns out to be the queen of beak to tail cooking, he loses his bottle when a 6 foot long snake complete with beating heart is served-up for dinner and finishes his week trying to impress Vietnam's pickiest foodies when he takes over a traditional restaurant and has his own Kitchen Nightmare.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Great Escape - Cambodia
programme.desc: Gordon is going off the beaten track to Cambodia. After the years of Khmer Rouge rule and civil war the country was at year zero. Today the country is in recovery and the food is undergoing a revival. Gordon scours the country hunting out historic recipes that pre-date the Khmer Rouge rule. He hires a chopper to take him into the heart of the jungle where he discovers a dessert fit for a restaurant, he turns hunter gatherer wading through snake infested rivers on the hunt for a Cambodian favourite, frog and is on the trail of Cambodia's hairiest delicacy, tarantula!

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing: Los Angeles

programme.desc: The Net Zero house is complete. Kevin and Tom discuss challenges with Jeff. Don gives Kevin a tour of the yard and barn. Dana shows Tom the upstairs. He checks out the main floor with Don. Richard reviews mechanicals. All gather in the transformed kitchen at the end.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Mid-century Modern Makeover
programme.desc: Tommy and Kevin cruise around Brookline, MA in a ’57 Chevy before rolling up to the latest project: a lackluster 1957 mid-century modern house in need of a total overhaul. They learn about the full scope of work, and Charlie starts in on demo.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Next-generation Demolition
programme.desc: While old fixtures are salvaged and asbestos is removed at the house, Norm, Richard and Kevin head back to where it all began 40 years ago, in Dorchester, MA. Later, Roger starts to remove a tree that’s threatening the property.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Apprentices in Sill School
programme.desc: Norm teaches the apprentices how to lay a sill on the new foundation, while Richard scopes the sewer to see what might be lurking inside. Kevin, the homeowners and their designer start in on a plan to create a sleek, modern space

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Beam Me Up, Tommy
programme.desc: The foundation of the house has no footings, so Mark McCullough pours a buttress. Kevin visits the 2001 Manchester by the Sea project. Back at the house, Richard solves a ductwork puzzle while Kevin and Tommy install a PVC trim overhang.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Norm Revisits a Skylight
programme.desc: Kevin meets electrician Heath Eastman to learn about in-counter outlets. Tommy visits former apprentice Nathan Gilbert to see what he’s been up to over the past year. Back at the house, Norm teaches Carly how to frame a skylight.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Stone Cold Pavers
programme.desc: Jenn and the homeowners select pavers for hardscape. Tommy and Norm install a skylight in the bathroom, while the sewer line and water main are completely replaced out front. The original foundation is also repaired.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Eight Is Enough Stairways
programme.desc: Tommy teaches Kevin how to calculate the riser height for a set of stairs. The foundation is insulated with a DIY foam system. Radiant heat is installed, and Norm and Richard head to Santa Fe to visit the project they did 30 years ago.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Can We Cantilever
programme.desc: Tommy shows Kevin the careful process of installing rafters for a cantilevered roof. Inside, Richard solves a venting problem for the kitchen sink before tackling the AC ductwork puzzle. Later, Tommy and Kevin install snow cleats on the roof.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | What's the Miter with the Corner
programme.desc: Mark McCullough rebuilds a century old Puddingstone wall. Tommy and Kevin revisit the 2005 Cambridge modern project. Electrician Heath Eastman installs trimless LED recessed lights. Large tanks are installed under the driveway for rain water runoff.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | See Glass
programme.desc: Kevin travels to the Midwest to see the manufacturing of plate glass and windows. Back in Brookline, Mauro teaches Kevin some cold weather painting tricks. Radiant heat is installed under the driveway, while the patio is installed in the front.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Attack of the Giant Tile
programme.desc: Mark Ferrante lays giant porcelain tile in the main living spaces of the house. Kevin and Richard head to sunny Key West to visit the 20th anniversary project. Back in Brookline, a hanging retro fireplace and modern kitchen cabinets are installed.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Finally Finishes
programme.desc: Finishing touches abound as the project wraps up: closet systems, modern baseboards and a linear wall drain in the master shower are all installed. Homeowner Sunil selects door hardware and Nathan Gilbert installs floating bathroom vanities.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 12 Chefs Compete" - The twelve remaining chefs must plan a gastronomic salute to a returning U.S. Marine. The losing team will have to clean and decorate for Tana Ramsay's party.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 11 Chefs Compete" - The remaining chefs must create three-course meals that only total 700 calories. The winners hit the beach with Olympic beach volleyball player Annett Davis.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 10 Chefs Compete" - The remaining chefs roll dice to determine which ingredients they will use for their challenge dish. The winning team earns a trip to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 9 Chefs Compete" - The nine remaining chefs take a blind taste test. The winners score a dinner date with Chef Ramsay in a pitch-black dining room where they can't see what they're eating.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 8 Chefs Compete" - The remaining chefs make crepes. The winners will dine at a French restaurant while the losers prepare for a French-themed dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 7 Chefs Compete" - Winter Olympic medalists Sasha Cohen and Jonny Moseley appear as guest judges. For this challenge, all ingredients must be sourced from Whistler, B.C.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 6 Chefs Compete" - The six remaining contestants must replicate the dishes that Chef Ramsay prepared for them. The winners will dine with season four winner Christina Machamer.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 5 Chefs Compete" - The challenge for each of the remaining contestants is to make a dish that looks as good as it tastes. Experts from "Bon Appetit" magazine help Chef Ramsay judge.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 4 Chefs Compete" - The contestants meet a miniature version of Chef Ramsay: British child actor and impressionist Felix Light. They must prepare meat-free meals for him and eighty other youngsters.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 6, 3 Chefs Compete" - In part one of the season finale, the three remaining competitors must prepare a dish with components from around the world. The judges are a group of international culinary experts.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Charlie's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay pays Charlie's a visit. Located in La Verne, California, this Italian eatery suffers from a lackluster menu and outdated décor.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Chiarella's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay lends a helping hand to an Italian restaurant in Philadelphia that is hampered by a weak menu and poor service.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Zocalo
programme.desc: In the season four finale, Chef Ramsay finds a befuddled staff and disappointing service at Zocalo, an Italian eatery in Philadelphia.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: La Galleria 33 (Part One)
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay treks to Boston to visit La Galleria 33, an Italian restaurant managed by sisters. Ramsay must improve their bland menu and fix a dire financial situation.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: La Galleria 33 (Part Two)
programme.desc: Continuing his work at La Galleria 33, Chef Ramsay helps management deal with staffing issues, menu improvements and décor renovation.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mama Maria's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay drops by Mama Maria's, a pizzeria in Brooklyn with an exhausted owner and an unmanageable staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Nino's Italian Restaurant
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to Long Beach, California to visit Nino's Italian Restaurant, where ownership has changed hands from a pleasant immigrant couple to their obnoxious son.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Bella Luna
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay assists a family-owned Italian restaurant in Easton, Philadelphia that's struggling due to the chef's incompetence and the owner's aloofness.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Zayna Flaming Grill (Part One)
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay must whip a family-owned restaurant in Redondo Beach, California back into shape. Internal struggles and bland food hold Zayna Flaming Grill back.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Zayna Flaming Grill (Part Two)
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay is caught in the crossfire as a family's feud threatens to close Zayna Flaming Grill for good.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: The seven remaining designers play naughty or nice in the fan-favorite Unconventional Materials Challenge that brings them to a Christmas decor emporium.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Keepin' It Classy " - It's back to school for the remaining eight designers in this fan-favorite Unconventional Materials Challenge to create high impact fashion from materials found in an elementary classroom. Guest judges are actors Michael Urie and Gabourey Sidibe.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "The Art of Construction" - A construction site forces designers to create feminine fashion from masculine materials for the notorious Unconventional Materials Challenge. Snooki and JWoww join the judges.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Welcome to the Urban Jungle" - The exhausted designers are whisked away to Universal Studios Orlando to recharge their batteries with a roller coaster or two. They are then challenged to find inspiration from their experience at the theme park to design a look for the "Urban Jungle." Guest judge Rebecca Minkoff joins.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Project Pop-Up " - The designers are faced with their second Team Challenge of the season and must work together to create 3-piece collections to be shown in a SoHo pop-up shop. However, working in teams leads to tensions and tantrums as the designers struggle to have their voices heard. Guest judge Kelly Osbourne returns.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Life is Full of Surprises" - The designers are pleasantly surprised when each one of them gets a special guest from home. But the emotional reunions with their mothers, daughters, and friends are quickly overshadowed by the drama of the next challenge when the designers learn that their newly arrived loved ones will also be their clients—and there is $50,000 on the line! Olivia Culpo and Katia Beauchamp join the judging panel.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "A Power Trip" - The designers take a majestic helicopter ride high above NYC for inspiration for their next challenge: to create an editorial, high fashion look for Marie Claire magazine. Guest judges Anne Fulenwider and Camilla Belle join the panel.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Go Bold or Go Home" - The designers are challenged to draw inspiration from metal and machinery for their next look. However, in another Project Runway first, they must create their avant-garde design using the metallic unconventional materials, as well as conventional materials from Mood. Shiri Appleby joins the judging panel.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Keeping it Weird" - In the final challenge before Fashion Week, the designers take a surprise trip to Austin, Texas, where the city's unofficial slogan is "Keep Austin Weird!" Once there, the designers are faced with an Unconventional Materials Challenge, leading them to create amazing (and weird!) pieces with the knowledge that the losing designer will be sent home just one step away from Fashion Week. Guest judge Priyanka Chopra joins.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 1" - After heading home to work on their Fashion Week collections, the designers are visited by Tim, who is not impressed with everything they have created so far. The designers return to NYC and present the judges with three pieces from their collection, and all of them realize how much work they have left before presenting all of their pieces at Fashion Week. Michael Kors returns as a guest judge.

programme.title: Verdad Oculta: Episodio 42
programme.desc: Después de la caída de un infame narco-líder, el coronel Diana está lista para tomarse un descanso de la policía y trabajar para arreglar su matrimonio. Su jefe, sin embargo, tiene otros planes y le asigna al coronel Diana su mayor misión hasta la fecha: desmantelar "el Clan del Norte" dirigido por los hermanos Zurria y sus aliados oficiales corruptos y funcionarios del gobierno.

programme.title: Escápate A Casa
programme.desc: Un cuento de la mayoría de edad en 1950 y de la perspectiva de una niña que tiene quince años.

programme.desc: Ana invoca la presencia de su madre muerta, revive una relación llena de ternura y, a veces, de dominio.

programme.title: Agua en la Boca
programme.desc: Es una historia de amor prohibido entre dos jóvenes, hijos de familias rivales. La hermosa Danielle Cassoulet (de descendencia francés) y el aventurero Luca Bellini (de descendencia italiana). El conflicto entre el cassoulet y la familia Bellini es viejo, siendo antes los mejores amigos de la juventud las matriarcas de esas familias hoy no pueden permanecer de pie debido a una disputa amorosa en el pasado en el que Françoise Cassoulet, y la abuela de Dany se peleaban por el amor de un mismo hombre.

programme.title: El Mono
programme.desc: A dos medio hermanas la vida les dará un giro radical luego de evento dramático.

programme.title: El Talisman
programme.desc: Tras perder un rancho en Texas, Camila Nájera y su familia se mudan a Fresno, California. El destino los llevará a ser vecinos del despiadado Gregorio Negrete, dueño del rancho "El Alcatraz". Gregorio ha vivido en guerra con Los Aceves, antiguos dueños de "El Talismán", y su único sueño es poseer ese rancho. Camila se verá envuelta en este juego de ambición y poder, que la lleva a conocer a dos hombres que le cambiarán la vida.

programme.title: Johnny Chicano
programme.desc: Un jóven campesino se enamora de su jefe estadounidense, creando mas que problemas para su novia mexicana y su familia.

programme.title: Ten 1 EP03
programme.desc: Tape Murder Case Part.3 A half-naked body of a woman brutally murdered with the tape wrapped around her face is found. Having no clues, Ji-hoon finds its similarity to ""Ghost Case,"" an unsolved case 7 years ago. However, the advent of Kim Eun-young, who exactly looks like Seo Eun-bi, confuses the investigation. Then, four detectives started from different cases, investigate the case together.

programme.title: Ten 1 EP04
programme.desc: The Visit of the Strangers Four family members are brutally murdered in a luxurious house. All the victims are found dead in their own rooms. The only survivor is a 70-year-old grandmother with Alzheimer's, and she can't remember a single thing. As the detectives dig into the case, the secrets of this family are revealed.

programme.title: Arahan
programme.desc: A hot-blooded young cop and the Seven Masters of unmatched inner strength meet up in this urban martial arts extravaganza

programme.title: Ten 1 EP05
programme.desc: The Queen The madam of a host bar, who holds the top secrets that can control the political sphere, is murdered at the villa. The head of the National Police secretly calls Ji-hoon in to investigate the case. The hidden secrets involved in her death embroil the political scandal.

programme.title: Ten 1 EP06
programme.desc: The Forest Chaser A woman's corpse is found in a forest. The detectives are shocked by how the body was brutally damaged. Having doubts about a serial case, the detectives assume that the criminal enjoyed human hunting. However, Ji-hoon presumes that the murderer has a message to be heard.

programme.title: Ten 1 EP07
programme.desc: Min Chae-won Abduction Part.1 A child waiting for her mom to pick her up suddenly disappears. A video sent by the kidnapper makes the detectives speculate that the criminal is a pedophile, but the circumstantial evidence suggests the child's voluntary runaway. Every second is crucial to saving the child.

programme.title: Ten 1 EP08
programme.desc: Min Chae-won Abduction Part.2 The detectives meet the new suspect, but the possibility of the child's survival becomes slim with the kidnapper's unpredictable behaviors. Then, team TEN confronts the criminal when the child's survival is insecure.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: an elderly woman visits the cottage she used to live in as a child. She recalls the memory of a boy she knew 47 years ago

programme.title: Mood Of The Day
programme.desc: A woman in a stalled relationship sits next to a charming womanizer on a train, and he's immediately determined to seduce her. They've got 24 hours to spend in a strange city together. Will he succeed?

programme.desc: Sakura's worried she might be pregnant.

programme.title: Risky Romance: Stalker

programme.title: Risky Romance: Infamous

programme.title: Risky Romance: Why So Serious?

programme.title: Risky Romance: The Real You

programme.title: Oh My Ghost: E03
programme.desc: Soon-ae is drawn to her father's restaurant and tries to help him by stealing supplies from Sun-woo's storage.

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: A battle between traitors conspiring coup d'etat and Joseon’s greatest swordsman has begun! Kim Ho, Korea’s greatest swordsman, gets demoted from the royal palace guard to a prison officer. One day, during a chaotic riot in the prison, five armed men try to break free Lee In-jwa, who’s been imprisoned for a conspiracy against the king. Kim Ho realizes that he alone can save the king in the palace where most of king’s people have turned.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: Kang-soo, an insurance investigator, has lost all the hope and purpose of living after his wife died. One day, the company gives him the case of Mi-so, a girl who’s fallen into a coma from a car accident. At the hospital he goes to investigate the case, he meets a girl who claims that she is Mi-so, who in reality can’t walk or talk. Kang-soo eventually comes to accept that for some reason only he can see the spirit of Mi-so. And Mi-so asks Kang-soo to help her biggest wish come true before she has to leave this world for good.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il, who is a five-month pregnant ahead of her marriage, goes to her hometown to find her biological father, whom she has never seen since the age of seven. After returning to Seoul, To-il’s mom, stepdad and biological father join forces to find the groom-to-be who has been missing on the day of the meeting with bride-groom families.

programme.title: OMG! Pets Countdown
programme.desc: Episode 109 - Welcome to OMG Pets Top 10 Countdown! The show where we bring you the doggiest of doggos, the cattiest of catties, and the birdiest of birdies, and much, much more!

programme.title: Mission Laughter
programme.desc: Episode 103 - Alright agents! Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to scour the world for the funniest perpetrators on the planet. We have eyes and ears around the globe and you, our top agent, must decipher six clues to find and detain the world's most notorious comedy criminals. This is Mission Laughter!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Mark Christopher Lawrence - Clean Outta Compton
programme.desc: Mark Christopher Lawrence (born May 22, 1964) is an American character actor, stand-up comedian, and voice-over artist. He is perhaps best known for his role as esoteric D.J., Tone Deaf, in the 1994 satirical rap mockumentary, Fear of a Black Hat. He has co-starred in popular films such as Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Planet of the Apes, Lost Treasure and The Pursuit of Happiness. Lawrence can currently be seen in his regular role as Big Mike on the NBC series Chuck. He has made guest appearances on many television programs, most notably Heroes, My Name Is Earl, Crossing Jordan, Dharma & Greg, Malcolm in the Middle, Touched by an Angel, Malcolm & Eddie, Men Behaving Badly, Seinfeld, Murphy Brown, and Martin. He is also featured on the Radio Series Adventures in Odyssey as "Ed Washington".

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Chris Voth - Cashmere
programme.desc: Chris Voth is an accomplished comedian, a licensed teacher, and a published author. Voth made his debut late-night television appearance on the Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson. He also appeared in three seasons of NBC's Last Comic Standing and was chosen for the prestigious Great American Comedy Festival. A 15-year comedy veteran, Voth is a past winner of the Denver Comedy Works Competition and has worked with everyone from Dave Chappelle to Larry the Cable Guy to Linda Ronstadt. Voth’s first comedy CD titled "Never Mind the Jim J Bullocks, Here's the Chris Voth" is currently available for purchase. Chris currently balances his performance schedule with his full-time high-school teaching career. You can read his short story, "Stand Up and Deliver," published in the Cream City Review Literary Journal. In it, Chris shares the experiences he had when entering the teaching field after years in stand-up comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Rex Havens - Women & Children First
programme.desc: Rex has been delighting comedy audiences for 20 years, in world-famous comedy clubs like The Improv, Catch-A-Rising Star, Funny Bones and Zanies, on television for Showtime, Comedy Central and Comic Relief, on radio with Bob & Tom and NPR, cruise ships worldwide, and corporate clients including GM, American Express, Texaco, 3M, Coca-Cola, IBM, Toshiba, Lowe’s, Johnson & Johnson, Ameritech, Proctor & Gamble, State Farm, Quaker Oats, Verizon and the IRS (“Working for the IRS is the only sure way to get money from them.”), and numerous non-profit and charitable organizations, such as St. Jude’s and the Make-A-Wish Foundation. A former college professor who made the unusual transition to the standup comedy stage in the ’80’s, Rex has always believed that laughter is the best defense against a confusing and challenging world. Rex’s take on marriage and family has propelled him to performances in all 50 states and around the world, including London, Hong Kong, Amsterdam, Bermuda, Montreal, Barcelona, Copenhagen, Aruba, Rome and Cannes.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jeff Jena - Old Dog, New Jokes
programme.desc: Jeffrey Jena is one of the top corporate and cruise comics working today. His thirty-three years of live performance experience and over forty national television shows, both as an actor and comic give him the ability to work for any audience

programme.title: Tim Young - What World is This?
programme.desc: Tim headlines clubs all over North America, has performed on over 500 college campuses as well as comedy festivals in New York, Montreal, and Seattle, and he's a fixture in the New York City club scene. He was a finalist on NBCs Last Comic Standing, has appeared on Comedy Centrals Premium Blend, Tough Crowd, and Shorties, and you may have seen him as a commentator on VH1, MTV, TLC and the E! Channel.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Steve Mazan - Humblebragger
programme.desc: Steve Mazan shot out of the famous San Francisco scene that produced comedy legends such as Robin Williams and Dana Carvey. In his decade-plus career, Steve has done stand-up everywhere from clubs and colleges across the country to corporate events, cruises, and many television shows including The Late Show with David Letterman. He even won an Emmy for his work writing on The Ellen Degeneres Show. His clean and clever comedy landed him on Letterman, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, The Bob & Tom Radio Show, Sirius/XM Radio and more. He’s even done audience warm-up for shows such as Deal or No Deal. But of all the performances Steve has done, he is most proud of his eight trips to Iraq and Afghanistan to perform for our troops. He’s also the subject of the award-winning film “Dying to do Letterman.”

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Shayne Smith - Alligator Boys
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Shayne Smith delivers more stories about everything from a failed robbery to a wrestling match in the New York Subway and even saving the life of a dog in his second original Dry Bar Comedy special, “Alligator Boys."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Kevin Bozeman - Clean and Unfiltered
programme.desc: In 1999, Kevin found himself in the real world with no real job skills and a strong desire to work an hour a day. What to do? Inspired by nights on the couch watching TV comedians, Kevin decided to head over to nearby Madison, WI and try the “Open-Mic Night”. Thirteen years later Kevin is still going on-stage, and he has found the job that fit his requirements. “For an hour a night I’m wildly successful”. With a smooth and clever style, a great smile and a contagious laugh Kevin has been entertaining in clubs and colleges across the country. In 2000 he was the winner of the Midwest region of the HBO “Comedy Competition” and flew to Los Angeles to compete as a finalist. He performed on Comedy Central’s “Premium Blend” in 2003, and finished 2nd in the Boston Comedy Competition in 2005. He was a semi-finalist on NBC’s “Last Comic Standing” in 2010. This past summer he co-starred in the Indie film “Flat Chested” starring Alicia Witt and Luke Perry. He currently resides in Chicago.

programme.title: Andy Erikson - Unicorn Style
programme.desc: Andy intertwines silly one-liners with whimsical stories in a playful but thought-provoking way.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Dennis Regan - Dennisland
programme.desc: The King Of Queens writer Dennis Regan comes swinging hard with his quick wit and flawless delivery. The laughs just keep on coming in "Dennisland".

programme.title: Kermit Apio - There's No I in Self Esteem
programme.desc: Born and raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, Kermet Apio enjoyed a childhood in paradise. He spent his time watching television, playing, and procrastinating everything else. To this day, he still does all three extensively. After graduating from high school, Kermet moved to Seattle to attend the University of Washington. Seattle became home. In early 1989, Kermet did his first open mike night at the Comedy Underground in Seattle. Comedy was a fun hobby. In May of 1990, he quit his job, said good bye to health care and benefits, and took the leap to performing full time. It is still his only job skill. He was the winner of the 2009 Great American Comedy Festival and has had numerous appearances on television and radio. He has showcased at comedy festivals in Aspen, Las Vegas, and Vancouver and has performed in 47 states and 3 Canadian provinces. He is a past winner of the Seattle Comedy Competition and was a semi-finalist in the San Francisco Comedy Competition. Also, in 1988 he was Dishwasher of the Month at the Sea-Tac Airport Dennyís. Kermet is married and the proud father of two wonderful children. He enjoys his family, baseball, and pie. He does not enjoy opera, sitting in traffic, and writing about himself in the third person.

programme.title: New Girl In Town - Episode 1
programme.desc: When the World Petacular comes to Heartlake City and is almost ruined before it's even started, five feisty girls unite, despite their differences, using their creativity to save the day. Best friends Olivia, Andrea, Emma, Mia and Stephanie reside in HeartLake City but didn't know each other - that is until the World Petacular brought them together! On the eve of the biggest event Heartlake City hosts, disaster and chaos is abound. New-in-town Olivia is helping her veterinarian Aunt Sophie with her mobile clinic. But when she's put in charge of training a scruffy puppy named Scarlet, the puppy runs amuck, leaving a trail of destruction as she collides with Andrea, ruins Emma's banner and Stephanie's cakes, and finally spooks Mia's horse Bella who bucks Mia off and sprints away. The girls quickly unite, helping each-other to save the day and most importantly have fun along the way!

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 2 - Episode 102
programme.desc: Realizing they must defend the Kingdom from Jestro's monsters, the Knights try to organize but are despondent when they discover their best advisor - Merlok the Magician - has sacrificed himself to save them. When Jestro awakens, he's been blasted miles and miles away from the King's Castle by Merlok's explosive spell. And, it seems, all the books he was trying to steal have been scattered, too. The Book of Monsters broke Jestro' fall and now he can use the book to attack the people who laughed at him. Meanwhile, the King and his newly-trained Knights pick through the rubble of Merlok's library. They'll have to figure something out, because Jestro and his newly made magic monsters attack King's Castle! Clay organizes the Knights to defend the kingdom, but they've never worked together before. It takes all their training, plus the help of an old friend...MERLOK! Only now he's MERLOK 2.0. Ava has been piecing together what happened and discovering that the "ghost in the machine" she's been chasing is really Merlok in digital form. Now, he can use his magic digitally and he downloads just the right weapons to the struggling Knights! They finally foil Jestro's attack with Merlok's help and officially become NEXO KNIGHTS!

programme.title: Stephanie's Surprise Party -Episode 2
programme.desc: When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they soon discover that it's not easy keeping their plans secret from Stephanie who becomes suspicious when none of the girls have time to hang out. When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they discover that it's not easy keeping their plans a secret. As the girls choreograph a dance routine, magic show and search for the perfect present and cake, Stephanie becomes aware that her friends are avoiding her on her birthday and excluding her from their activities... Little does she know that her friends are secretly preparing a surprise pool party for her! Once the surprise is revealed Stephanie realises how much her friends care about her and the importance of friendship.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe - The Fangpyres - to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok - Episode 103
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV...maybe they can "mod" that for their own, "knightly" use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling...in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. "Of course I'm the leader...I'm a Richmond."

programme.title: Dolphin Cruise -Episode 3
programme.desc: Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a science contest at school and win a trip on a luxury yacht but not everything goes as planned when they set out to sea. When Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a school science contest and win a Dolphin sight-seeing trip, not everything goes to plan...As the girls set out to sea on a luxury yacht, misunderstandings and disagreements occur which become secondary when they discover a pod of dolphins in danger. The girls learn that they have to compromise and trust in each other if they are to save the dolphins and their trip out to sea...

programme.title: Never Trust A Snake
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor - the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe. Pythor lures Lloyd under his spell and steals a map from him that will show him where the remaining two snakes tribes dwell and Uncle Sensei saves Lloyd from doom.

programme.title: The Knights Code - Episode 104
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert - Macy's parents - from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: Country Girls - Episode 4
programme.desc: When the girls go to Mia's grandparents' ranch and Olivia accidentally knocks down the neighbor's barn, the girls promise to raise money to rebuild it and now have to learn to set aside their differences and work together to make good on their promise. Mia invites her friends to her grandparents' ranch for the weekend. But when Olivia accidentally knocks down a neighbor's barn with a tractor, the girls promise to raise the money to rebuild it themselves. Complicating matters, Mia and Stephanie turn out to like the same boy, Martin. They'll have to learn to set aside their differences and work together if they're going to raise enough money to make good on their promise.

programme.title: The Snake King
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer - an ancient beast who can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: Fright Knight - Episode 105
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds "The Book of Fear." It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her "knighmarish" power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest - as they fight off the Whipperella - that they we find out Aaron's true fear - the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Emma's Dilemma - Episode 5
programme.desc: When Stephanie becomes obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in a float building contest and accidentally disregards Emma's ideas and design, Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to get revenge on Stephanie. When the girls enter a float-building contest, Emma is especially excited to share her design idea for the float. But no one is listening to her, especially Stephanie, who's become obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in the contest. Emma finally does find someone who appreciates her design... Tanya! Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to build the float design. But is Tanya just using Emma to get revenge on Stephanie?

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: The Golden Castle - Episode 106
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie "Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle" he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: "The Golden Castle." While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for "The Golden Castle" and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a "script." The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight...Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: Friends Of The Jungle - Episode 6
programme.desc: When Olivia's Aunt Sophie is getting married and the groom has gone missing in the jungle, the girls fly out to the jungle in secret to try to find him in time for the wedding. The girls are super excited to be planning a wedding for Olivia's Aunt Sophie. There's just one little problem: Olivia learns that the groom has gone missing in the jungle while working at an animal rescue station! Not wanting to worry her aunt, Olivia, Stephanie and Mia secretly fly to the jungle to try and find the groom, Henry, rescuing a few animals along the way. Too bad Emma and Andrea couldn't keep the secret back in Heartlake City. Now, Sophie, Emma and Andrea join the others in the jungle to try and find Henry before the rapidly approaching wedding date!

programme.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement - Episode 107
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something...one of the Magic Books! It's "The Book of Deception." They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: Andrea's Big Moment - Episode 7
programme.desc: When famous pop star Livi comes to Heartlake City to judge a talent show, our five friends Olivia, Mia, Andrea, Emma and Stephanie all decide to enter - and one of them, in particular, really wants to win but faces some serious challenge from an old rival. A talent show has come to Heartlake City and all the girls enter the talent competition hoping to impress the judges, especially their idol, pop star Chloe. No one wants a shot at stardom more than Andrea, which is why the other girls are surprised when she doesn't show up to practice before the first round of the competition. Very nearly eliminated prior to the big show, Andrea panics and throws herself into an intense practice-training mode, even shutting her friends out when they're trying to help her with her performance. Just moments before her live TV debut, Andrea realizes she's missing a key element to her act. Can she pull it off without her friends? And are the other girls willing to help after being pushed away?

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win "The Blade Cup" where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: The Black Knight - Episode 108
programme.desc: It seems the NEXO-Knights are attacking villages throughout the realm! But why? A mysterious Black Knight appears to defend the cities from the rogue NEXO-villains! Jestro, happy he has the REAL Book of Deception, uses it to create bad versions of the NEXO-Knights. The "fake" knights then attack villages and hamlets. When the real NEXO-Knights arrive, they're booed and pelted with food. Why does everyone hate them? To make matters more confusing, a giant Mech Suit in black - The BLACK KNIGHT - appears to defend the kingdom's villages from the fake knights. The Black Knight ends up being very powerful and throws Jestro and his fake knights for a loop. He's cool and mysterious. But when the fake Knights get the better of him, the REAL NEXO-Knights appear to fend them off and learn their deceptive secret. The Knights save the Black Knight and they open him up to find...young ROBIN! (He used a deep, deceptive voice.) The Knights realize that Robin has potential. But maybe he still has some learning to do.

programme.title: Kate's Island - Episode 8
programme.desc: The five friends leave for science camp that takes place on an island and during the trip, they meet the stand-offish Kate - but they soon realize that there's more to her than meets the eyes and that you shouldn't judge the book by its cover. No one is more excited than Olivia about science camp at a beautiful rocky offshore island with a lighthouse. But Olivia quickly gets off on the wrong foot with a mysterious girl named Kate who seems obsessed with a medallion necklace and the island's rumored history of pirates and treasure. Even worse for Olivia, Kate seems to be growing extra chummy with Mia, even sneaking around the island with her late at night. With the help of Stephanie, Emma and Andrea, Olivia is determined to get to the bottom of the girls' secret friendship and find out once and for all what they're searching for on the island, but they better not let Mrs. Stevens catch them out of their cabin past curfew.

programme.title: The Green Ninja
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes inside the unstable Fire Temple that is built on a volcano.

They think the marsh is boring and Helga thinks they are snooty. Luckily there is one game where they can all be friends again. / Benny Beaver wants to gather stones but has to go with his big sister. Bennie doesn't want her to come along and runs away because he doesn't want a babysitter. He meets some friends who remind him that it's important to watch out for one another.

programme.title: Heal
