programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: CarGo
programme.desc: A young car learns the importance of family when he embarks on a mission to rescue his father - who's been sent to Clunker Island to be repurposed as junk metal.

programme.title: Dragonquest
programme.desc: After the ruthless Krill (Brian Thompson) harnesses the power of a deadly fire-breathing dragon, he begins a bloody campaign of world domination. From the ashes of a scorched village, Arkadi (Daniel Bonjour), an unassuming farm boy, embarks on an arduous journey to restore the lost pieces of a mystical amulet -- the only weapon powerful enough to destroy Krill. With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E5 | Trouble's Brewing
programme.desc: Kent, Art and Natasha demand human privileges, but a coffee maker hijacks their robot revolution and takes over the ship. Meanwhile, time distortion turns Tina and Michael's half-day mission into a year-long ordeal on a barren planet.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E6 | Powerless
programme.desc: With the ship trapped in a lightning storm, Karen struggles to persuade the crew to limit their power usage, while Stewart learns to pilot the ship manually with help from Zalian. Meanwhile, Kent attempts to re-educate Natasha, who has been reduced to the mental age of a child after the first lightning strike.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E7 | First Contact
programme.desc: An alien appears in Stewart's dreams, but only seems to communicate if Stewart's dreams are erotic in nature. Stewart enlists both A.R.T. and Zalian's medicine cabinet in a dark, humiliating journey to make first contact. Karen slaps Michael in a rage over his tryst with Tina, and has to go undergo HR arbitration, overseen by an un-objective Tina.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E8 | Finale
programme.desc: The crew makes contact with an alien at long last, but this historic moment is cut short when they realize they have a chance to make it home through an interplanetary ripple. Stewart and Michael decide to stay behind to learn more about the alien's culture, only to be underwhelmed - when they return, Karen chews them out for their mistake. Meanwhile, Tina uses Zalian, A.R.T., holograms, sedatives, and magnets to give Kent and Natasha their first and only date. Both groups are ripped from their activities by a series of shocking revelations about the universe.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Drama
programme.desc: There may be one defining human feature across the planet and it may be our love of drama.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Horror
programme.desc: Science fiction is scary. These films prove that. Keep the lights on.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E6 | The Thief Taker
programme.desc: Explore the stories of a man who painstakingly recreates miniature historic figures, and an English gentleman who would find stolen items for a small fee but turned out to be the thief.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E7 | The Bones of 'Mad' Anthony Wayne
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a Revolutionary War general who received an unusual burial, the sprawling history of ice cream, and a town in Southern California that is the center of the world.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E8 | The Johnstown Flood
programme.desc: We explore the stories of one of the deadliest disasters in American history, as well as an elephant-shaped building and its interesting history on a seaside town.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E9 | The Liberty Bell
programme.desc: We explore the stories of how a 14-year-old farm boy invented television and went to court to prove it, as well as how the Liberty Bell came to develop its crack.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E10 | Turkey Tracks
programme.desc: We explore a Connecticut town that claims to have dinosaur tracks, a museum of smugglers and their methods of smuggling, and the story of an artist who uses all types of wood to make his dream home.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E11 | The Brookdale Inn
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a small town named after a sports star who had never been to it, and a British couple who strive to recreate the 1940s in their home life.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E11 | Stolen Glory: The Cover-up of Cosmonaut Vladimir Ilyushin
programme.desc: With the collapse of communism and the rise of freedom in the Russian Federation, recent access to documents in the Kremlin archives reveal a story intended to remain buried forever.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E12 | Science Fraud: Is the Tail Wagging the Dog?
programme.desc: The cold fusion debacle and the discovery of the Piltdown man stand as two of the greatest shams in history. Have scientists learned anything from the real or alleged goldbricks of the past?

programme.title: Challenge The Devil
programme.desc: A group of dropouts find an old man in a castle who turns into the Devil and seizes them.

programme.title: Outerman
programme.desc: The fictional hero Outer Man actually lands in Japan, promising to protect the world from the forces of evil.

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Teacher
programme.desc: A night school teacher and an alien beast rampage in a toe-to-toe battle.

programme.title: The Age Of Blood
programme.desc: His duty is to protect the king, at any cost. They want a revolution. Blood will be spilt.

programme.title: Danger Pays
programme.desc: When 1 million yen go missing, Tokyo's criminal underworld leap at the opportunity to get rich.

programme.title: Mutant Swingers From Mars
programme.desc: A "long lost sci-fi film" from the 50's has been recovered! Martians come to Earth to steal our women!

programme.title: Stronger (2017)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in the inspiring true story of the real life 2013 Boston Marathon bombing survivor Jeff Bauman.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour (2011)
programme.desc: A group of young people hide out in a nightclub when aliens start to invade the planet. They eventually emerge to discover that they may be the only survivors left on earth.

programme.title: The Secret Lives of Dorks
programme.desc: When cheerleader Carrie realizes that dorky Payton's crush is likely to last 'til middle age, she sets him up with a dorkette from school. Sadly, Payton is a dating disaster area.

programme.title: Awful Nice
programme.desc: Mishaps and misadventures hamper two quarrelling brothers' mission to renovate and flip the lake house they inherited from their deceased father.

programme.title: About Alex
programme.desc: 'About Alex' is the story of seven college friends who reunite over a three-day weekend, after one of them attempts suicide. When the friends get together to keep an eye on Alex, the weekend that ensues will renew old crushes and resentments, shine light on bad decisions, and ultimately push friendships and relationships to the brink as the group tries to speculate when the simple life of their college years turned so muddy and complex. Sometimes irreverent, sometimes poetic, and always moving, About Alex is a searingly honest look at the changing nature of adult friendship in the Facebook/Twitter generation.

programme.title: 10,000 Saints
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s, a teenager from Vermont moves to New York City to live with his father in East Village.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: This Oscar®-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: The Court Jester
programme.desc: Danny Kaye plays kind-hearted entertainer Hawkins who disguises himself as the legendary king of jesters, Giacomo. Hawkins infiltrates the court of the evil villain Basil Rathbone, but when a sorceress hypnotizes him, royal chaos ensues.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: George Eastman is a poor young man determined to win a place in society and the heart of a beautiful socialite (Elizabeth Taylor). Shelley Winters plays the factory girl whose dark secret threatens Eastman’s professional and romantic prospects.

programme.title: Hatari!
programme.desc: Director Howard Hawks reteams with John Wayne, who heads a group of highly skilled professional game hunters in Africa. Only they don’t use bullets – they capture the ferocious big game with strong rope and cameras for zoos and circus attractions.

programme.title: A Way Back Home
programme.desc: When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

programme.title: Front of the Class
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Brad Cohen, who, after being challenged by Tourette's syndrome from a very young age, defies all odds to become a gifted teacher.

programme.title: Midway to Love
programme.desc: When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart. Stars Rachel Hendrix, Daniel Stine.

programme.title: Crossroads: A Story of Forgiveness
programme.desc: Bruce Murakami discovers that the tragic accident that killed his wife and daughter was the result of a street racing incident.

programme.title: After the Glory
programme.desc: A group of WWII veterans returning to their small midwestern town , find in the strong-arm tactics of local politicians, the same tyranny they went off to fight against and band together to defeat it at home.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: Tells the intriguing and highly seductive story behind one of Vermeer’s greatest and most enigmatic paintings.

programme.title: Blue Valentine
programme.desc: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

programme.title: Buffalo '66
programme.desc: Billy kidnaps a dancer and forces her to pretend to be his wife in order to impress his dysfunctional family.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: When Nathan discovers the people who raised him are not his parents, he begins to uncover unsettling secrets.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A ghost writer, completing the memoirs of a British PM, uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Steel Frontier
programme.desc: A story of a gunfighter who goes after a band of marauders that is terrorizing and killing indiscriminately.

programme.title: New Rose Hotel
programme.desc: Two businessmen are hired to steal secrets from a rival, so they decide to use a beautiful call girl to do so.

programme.title: Passion Fish
programme.desc: After an accident leaves her a paraplegic, a former soap opera star (Mary McDonnell) struggles to recover until she meets her newest nurse (Alfre Woodard), who has struggles of her own.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: Confederate veteran John Chandler (Alan Ladd) returns from defeat in war to find his home razed, his wife dead and his young son, David (David Ladd), traumatized and rendered mute. Desperate to cure the boy, Chandler takes David to a small town in Illinois where he hopes to find a doctor. But, soon after the pair arrives, Chandler finds himself framed for assault -- and forced to choose between serving hard time and working for struggling local farmer Linnett Moore (Olivia de Havilland).

programme.title: The Good Catholic
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, small-town priest Daniel is torn between his commitment to his job and his newfound love, Jane. With Danny Glover.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Two thrill-seeking adventurers cross paths with a beautiful doctor and they find themselves on the ultimate hunt for a treasure that claims all who seek it.

programme.title: Electra Woman and Dyna Girl
programme.desc: Electra Woman & Dyna Girl stars YouTube sensations Grace Helbig and Hannah Hart as a crime-fighting duo that take their super persons and crime-fighting chops up a notch when they move from small-town Ohio to the glitz and glamour of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a plague of bizarre, puzzling murders grip London, young Holmes and his new found friend Watson find themselves unwittingly entangled in the dark mystery.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Super-spies Gregorio (Antonio Banderas) and Ingrid (Carla Gugino) give up their lives of intrigue to raise their children. After a sinister super-villain kidnaps the parents, it's up to the kids to come to the rescue.

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Jackie Chan ("Rush Hour") stars as an undercover police officer who infiltrates a deadly prison where a team of mercenaries is being assembled.

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.

programme.title: Battle of Kings: Bannockburn
programme.desc: This graphic docu-drama tells the story of the pivotal campaign of Scotland's King Robert the Bruce against King Edward II of England, culminating in the Battle of Bannockburn in 1314.

programme.title: Firepower
programme.desc: Two undercover cops risk it all by going deep inside a federally sanctioned haven of gambling, prostitution, drugs and violence, to bring down a psychotic criminal mastermind.

programme.title: American Warfighter
programme.desc: Rusty Wittenburg is a Navy SEAL struggling to balance his family life and his job. He fights daily to maintain the line between reality and the nightmares his PTSD conjures up for him.

programme.title: Point and Shoot
programme.desc: Directed by Academy Award-winner Marshall Curry, Matthew VanDyke is on a journey of self discovery when he befriends a Libyan hippie who he fights alongside during the Libyan Revolution — camera in one hand, gun in the other.

programme.title: Little Dieter Needs To Fly
programme.desc: Werner Herzog's haunted tale of German-American pilot, Dieter Dengler, and his candid account of his imprisonment during the Vietnam war, complete with reenactments that are almost too real.

programme.title: Chernobyl: 30 Years On
programme.desc: 2016 marked thirty years since history's worst nuclear accident. Steps are still being taken to contain the radiation and stop leaks, but innovative new solutions must be found to protect people.

programme.title: Letter from Masanjia
programme.desc: An Oregon woman finds an SOS message from a Chinese dissident in a package of Halloween decorations, setting off a chain of events that exposes human rights violations and leads to sweeping labor reform in China.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 1
programme.desc: 'The Search'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 2
programme.desc: 'Family Secrets'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 3
programme.desc: 'Allele 26'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 4
programme.desc: 'The Trial'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Queen: The Awakening
programme.desc: This is a story about Vampires and the struggle for rulership amongst the elders and elites. Humanity is at stake and if the wrong House is nominated for rulership it could be doom for the living.

programme.title: DWB: Dating While Black
programme.desc: DWB: Dating While Black is a very honest and comedic look at the dating process of through the eyes of several individuals. Two former co-workers, Eric and Alex, have been recently laid off of their jobs and they run into each other on a job interview. While searching for new jobs, they forge a personal relationship that involves Alex, a womanizing ladies' man, helping the naive and recently dumped Eric understand women better. Along the path are various dating scenarios from different characters that come in and out of the lives of both Alex and Eric who all demonstrate the struggles, strains, and triumphs of Dating While Black.

programme.title: Don't Shoot
programme.desc: After the unarmed shooting of William King, a college bound black teen, by two white officers, a city is on fire as it seeks justice in these times of racial division.

programme.title: Brute Sanity
programme.desc: Keradin, an up-and-coming FBI agent, successfully extracts a stolen artifact from a den of criminals, despite freakish hallucinations. A year later, Keradin has returned to academia as a postdoctoral researcher in neuropsychology. Her former FBI boss, Maskin, swarms her research center with a group of agents to find a second artifact - a device which can alter reality. Realizing Maskin has sinister intentions, Keradin teams up with a thief to find the artifact first while Maskin unleashes bizarre traps to stop her.

programme.title: Her Happy Place
programme.desc: Tasha lost her job and her boyfriend. Even worse, she lost the love for herself. Her friend Felicia helps her time travel to find when she lost her self love hoping they can get it back.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 1
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 2
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: The Baron And The Kid
programme.desc: Johnny Cash, Greg Webb, Tracy Pollan William “The Baron” Addington (Johnny Cash) is a former pool pro whose lifetime of boozing has cost him his career and family. In an attempt to straighten out his life, he quits drinking and plays pool only for charity.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: FAT: A Documentary 2
programme.desc: FAT: A Documentary 2 is the sequel to the international sensation that delves deeper into the lies and myths surrounding the age old question: "What should I be eating?"

programme.title: All For One
programme.desc: A five year journey. Thousands of miles biked. Unlikely champions born. United by their renegade spirit and a determination to win against substantial odds, team members Mathew Hayman, esteban Chaves, Simon Gerrans, Matthew Keenan, Phil Liggett, and Robbie Mcewen show the true meaning of 'All for One. ' Follow the most tremendous Aussies on their long road to success becoming Australia's first ProTour cycling team.

programme.title: Stronger for Life
programme.desc: Follow an international fitness expert's inspiring journey from cancer to recovery proving her philosophy that physical exercise makes you stronger to face all of life's adversities

programme.title: Beyond Weight Loss
programme.desc: Beyond Weight Loss is a film that takes a hard look into the world of sustainable weight loss by exposing the fraud and deceit of diet industry and our government. Find out the truth behind fad diets, food labels and permanent fat loss.

programme.title: 25,000 Miles to Glory
programme.desc: A sports wanderlust by two guys to visit every NFL stadium in a split-window VW Bus named 'Hail Mary.' The film is a celebration of freedom, friendship, football, and America.

programme.title: Fittest in Dubai
programme.desc: 'Fittest in Dubai' is a 60 min documentary film of the first CrossFit Sanctional event in the world. First place male and female competitors qualify for a position to the CrossFit Games in the United States.

programme.title: Sail A Crooked Ship
programme.desc: An incompetent burglar who boards a freighter with his gang of thugs, in order to escape after a bank heist, and becomes captain of the barely seaworthy freighter.

programme.title: The Taming Of The Shrew
programme.desc: A rambunctious version of Shakespeare's comedy about a rich merchant who has two daughters, one sweet, comely and shy and the other gorgeous but mean-tempered. The sweet-tempered daughter is being courted by several young men who are stunned when her father announces that she cannot marry until her sister does.

programme.title: Our Man In Havana
programme.desc: A vacuum cleaner salesman is recruited by the British secret service to act as a spy in Havana.

programme.title: Ten Tall Men
programme.desc: A renegade Foreign Legionnaire leads an outlaw band of soldiers against an Arab tribe's attack on a French fortress in North Africa.

programme.title: The Admirable Crichton
programme.desc: Based on the James Barrie classic, THE ADMIRABLE CRICHTON tells the story of an English butler who, shipwrecked with his employers, resourcefully leads them in their attempts to survive.

programme.title: Sylvester
programme.desc: An unforgettable drama for the entire family, as a young girl risks everything for the horse only she believes in.

programme.title: Fast Forward
programme.desc: Eight young dancers from Ohio come to New York to compete in a dance contest and learn to survive in the city.

programme.title: Miracle Of The Heart: A Boys' Town Story
programme.desc: An inspirational story about two individuals who learned the value of believing in themselves.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A determined high school music teacher promotes a song and dance competition that brings the community closer.

programme.title: Wholly Moses
programme.desc: Tourists in Israel find an old scroll, the Book of Herschel, about a false savior upstaged by Moses.

programme.title: Major Dundee
programme.desc: A Union officer in charge of a jail in the Southwest enlists prisoners to fight against renegade Apaches.

programme.title: Good Day For A Hanging
programme.desc: An ex-lawman risks losing the support of his neighbors when he attempts to bring a popular outlaw to justice.

programme.title: Al Jennings Of Oklahoma
programme.desc: An up-and-coming lawyer abandons his legal career to become a notorious Oklahoma bank robber.

programme.title: Legend Of The Golden Gun
programme.desc: A quiet young farmer turns into a deadly gunfighter who dedicates his life to the pursuit of evildoers.

programme.title: Man In The Saddle
programme.desc: A small-time rancher loses his girl to a big-time rancher. She sees the error of her ways only too late.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: Terror In A Texas Town
programme.desc: A greedy financier and a gang of gunmen force people to sell land.

programme.title: Of Mice and Men
programme.desc: John Malkovich, Gary Sinise and Sherilyn Fenn shine in this contemporary remake of the beloved classic about a nomadic farm worker who looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend.

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: After his friends Mr. Cousin is wounded and Mr. Brother is killed, Earp goes after the people who did it.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: A local girl wants to marry a painter but her family is against it. The painter was told by Buntline to ask Earp for help.

programme.title: The Proposition
programme.desc: In this gritty Western written by acclaimed songwriter Nick Cave, a lawman (Guy Pearce) apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: California learns he shares with six others an inheritance in which the survivors share equally as any of the others die. Murder ensues, so Hoppy begins an investigation.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: The boys arrive at Jeff Potter's inn for Lucky's wedding to find the bride has postponed it to due the disappearance of her uncle.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho face a bandit gang that is using modern technology: the first telephone in the West.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho meet up with Griffith's traveling show consisting of ex-sheriff Ben, his daughter and their trained elephant Mildred. Stokes and Shaddon are after a medallion in their possession.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho discover a wounded boy in an abandoned shack who says that outlaws killed his older brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Lucas run into Micah on the trail and help when the prisoner he is transporting injures his arm. Lucas' life is endangered when a snake crawls into his bed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Mark goes hunting for Old Spike, Lucas goes hunting for his mortal enemy. Lucas is thrown into jail to stop him from murdering his former friend.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is baffled when the marshal of a neighboring town refuses to hold a gambler who just attempted murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark is injured in an accident, leaving his legs paralyzed. At the doctor's suggestion, Lucas and Mark set out on a trek to Mission Springs.
